data.lyric:
[ti:Is There Someone Else?]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:Dawn FM (Clean)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Is There Someone Else? - The Weeknd
[00:10.17]Lyrics by：Tommy Brown/Peter Lee Johnson/Abel Tesfaye/Daniel Lopatin
[00:20.34]Composed by：Tommy Brown/Peter Lee Johnson/Abel Tesfaye/Daniel Lopatin
[00:30.51]I know that you're hiding something from me
[00:34.33]That's been close to your heart
[00:36.21]
[00:37.69]And I felt it creeping up every day
[00:41.31]Baby right from the start
[00:43.05]I know that look you give when we're fighting
[00:46.73]
[00:47.54]We're fighting
[00:49.33]
[00:50.09]'Cause I used to be the one who was lying
[00:54.62]Oh lying
[00:56.35]Oh is there someone else or not
[01:00.96]
[01:01.60]'Cause I wanna keep you close
[01:04.82]I don't wanna lose my spot
[01:08.12]
[01:08.70]'Cause I need to know
[01:10.46]If you're hurting him or you're hurting me
[01:14.09]If I ain't with you I don't wanna be
[01:18.69]Is there someone else or not
[01:22.49]
[01:23.03]Oh or not
[01:26.43]
[01:27.64]I don't deservе someone loyal to me
[01:31.16]Don't you think I see
[01:33.09]
[01:34.50]And I don't want to bе a prisoner to who I used to be
[01:39.90]I swear I changed my ways for the better the better
[01:46.42]
[01:46.95]'Cause I wanna be with you forever forever
[01:53.43]Oh is there someone else or not
[01:57.82]
[01:58.44]'Cause I wanna keep you close
[02:01.70]I don't wanna lose my spot
[02:04.81]
[02:05.57]'Cause I need to know
[02:07.47]If you're hurting him or you're hurting me
[02:10.95]If I ain't with you I don't wanna be
[02:14.95]
[02:15.59]Is there someone else or not
[02:19.37]
[02:19.87]Oh or not
data.trans:
[ti:Is There Someone Else?]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:Dawn FM (Clean)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:10.17]//
[00:20.34]//
[00:30.51]我知道你对我有所隐瞒
[00:34.33]秘密藏于你的心中
[00:36.21]
[00:37.69]每天我都能感觉到它在蔓延
[00:41.31]宝贝 从一开始
[00:43.05]我能读懂你的眼神 当我们争吵时
[00:46.73]
[00:47.54]我们争吵
[00:49.33]
[00:50.09]因为我曾经是那个撒谎的人
[00:54.62]撒谎
[00:56.35]你心里是不是有别人了 有没有呢
[01:00.96]
[01:01.60]因为我想让你留在我的身边
[01:04.82]我不愿失去我在你心目中的位置
[01:08.12]
[01:08.70]因我需要知道
[01:10.46]你是在伤害他 抑或是在伤害我呢
[01:14.09]若我们不再是两情相悦 那我不愿意勉强在一起
[01:18.69]你心里是不是有别人了 有没有呢
[01:22.49]
[01:23.03]有没有呢
[01:26.43]
[01:27.64]我配不上一个忠于我的伴侣
[01:31.16]难道你觉得我没有意识到吗
[01:33.09]
[01:34.50]我不愿被过去的我禁锢
[01:39.90]我发誓我变得更好
[01:46.42]
[01:46.95]因我渴望与你厮守永生
[01:53.43]你心里是不是有别人了 有没有呢
[01:57.82]
[01:58.44]因为我想让你留在我的身边
[02:01.70]我不愿失去我在你心目中的位置
[02:04.81]
[02:05.57]因我需要知道
[02:07.47]你是在伤害他 抑或是在伤害我呢
[02:10.95]若我们不再是两情相悦 那我不愿意勉强在一起
[02:14.95]
[02:15.59]你心里是不是有别人了 有没有呢
[02:19.37]
[02:19.87]有没有呢
